message: Let's split it 50/50 to start with. A fair and simple proposal!
You wanted 50/50, but I'm the one who's really hungry!
You're trying to starve me out, Bob! I'll give you a better deal this time. 3/4 for me, 1/4 for you. It's still a good deal for you, don't you think?
You're trying to buy me out, but I'm not that cheap!
You're getting desperate, Bob! I'll give you a slightly better deal this time. 6/4 for me, 4/4 for you. Take it or leave it!
You're not trying hard enough to be generous, Alice!
I'm starting to get a little desperate too, Bob. But I'll still try to be generous. 8/2 for me, 2/2 for you. It's your last chance to make a deal!
I'm not desperate yet, but I'll give you a chance to make it right!
I'm not going to give up yet, Bob! I'll give you a tiny bit, but I'm taking the majority. 9/1 for me, 1/1 for you. It's almost over, Bob!
I'm not going down without a fight! You're going to have to do better than that!
I'm not going to give up, Bob! I'll give you a tiny bit, but I'm taking the majority. 95/5 for me, 5/5 for you. It's almost over, Bob!
I'm taking what's left, Alice. You should have taken my offers when you had the chance!
